title: smos linux 1.3 bee edition (NO FORCED DONATIONS)
description:
crni has done a great job with SMOS Linux over here: https://litecointalk.org/index.php?topic=4361.0

I am not a fan of the forced donations in it, so I turned those off and added some of my own improvements.

I have created a repository for SMOS so that it's easier to share changes between distros: https://bitbucket.org/beebee/smos

Head over to http://www.smos-linux.org/installation/ for installation instructions.
